mapper.sql: id, xzqy, cllx, ppxh, rllb, syxz, jyrq, jyjgmc, jyjl, zjcs
mapper.insert: insert into t_inspection (id, xzqy, cllx, ppxh, rllb, syxz, jyrq, jyjgmc, jyjl, zjcs) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cllx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rllb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyjl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_inspection
id,
xzqy,
cllx,
ppxh,
rllb,
syxz,
jyrq,
jyjgmc,
jyjl,
zjcs,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: truncate table t_inspection; SELECT t_inspection_report.id id, t_inspection_report.xzqy xzqy , t_inspection_report.cllx cllx, t_inspection_report.ppxh ppxh, t_inspection_instrument.rllb rllb, t_inspection_report.syxz syxz, t_inspection_report.jyrq jyrq, t_inspection_report.jyjgmc jyjgmc, t_inspection_report.jyjl jyjl, t_inspection_instrument.zjcs FROM t_inspection_report left join t_inspection_instrument ON t_inspection_report.id = t_inspection_instrument.id
